mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USED_PRODUCT(UPRODUCT_NO, SUBJECT, NICKNAME, PRICE, INFO, UPRODUCT_CD, AREA, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO) VALUES(#{uproduct_no}, #{subject}, #{nickname}, #{price}, #{info}, #{uproduct_cd}, #{area}, #{mainphoto}, #{photo})
mapper.select: SELECT UPRODUCT_NO, SUBJECT, NICKNAME, UPRODUCT_CD, PRICE, INFO, STATUS, AREA, LOCATION, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO, CASE WHEN STATUS = 1 THEN '판매중' WHEN STATUS = 2 THEN '판매완료' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS STATUS_TEXT FROM USED_PRODUCT ORDER BY SUBJECT
SELECT UPRODUCT_NO, SUBJECT, NICKNAME, UPRODUCT_CD, PRICE, INFO, STATUS, AREA, LOCATION, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO FROM USED_PRODUCT WHERE SUBJECT LIKE #{keyword} ORDER BY SUBJECT

SELECT UPRODUCT_NO, SUBJECT, NICKNAME, UPRODUCT_CD, PRICE, INFO, STATUS, AREA, LOCATION, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO, CASE WHEN STATUS = 1 THEN '판매중' WHEN STATUS = 2 THEN '판매완료' ELSE '알 수 없음' END AS STATUS_TEXT FROM USED_PRODUCT WHERE UPRODUCT_NO = #{uproduct_no}
SELECT MEMBER.USERPHOTO FROM USED_PRODUCT JOIN MEMBER ON USED_PRODUCT.NICKNAME=MEMBER.NICKNAME WHERE USED_PRODUCT.NICKNAME=#{nickname} LIMIT 1
